name: ShadowNoir
description:
Shadow Noir, detective game/metroidvania, at least that was where I was going. The thinking is that the more mysteries you solve, the more of the map opens up.

Technically I did not make a game this jam, I got both too ambitious and too distracted, (blender cloth animations, woah). Anyway, best description is a 30 second tech demo, maybe some ideas for future games?
